description:
html: copy attributes from extra <html> tags to root element

Pass tests2.dat, test 50:
<!DOCTYPE html><html><body><html id=x>

| <!DOCTYPE html>
| <html>
|   id="x"
|   <head>
|   <body>

Also pass tests through test 56:
<!DOCTYPE html>X<p/x/y/z>

messages.text:

|   <head>
|   <body>

Also pass tests through test 56:
